content.text:
# Early medieval states in Kazakhstan__disambig_1

During the earlier medieval period, a succession of mainly Turkic states ruled in the area of present-day Kazakhstan.

| First Turkic Khaganate

| Old Turkic
|-

| 581–742
| Suyab
| Kazakhstan, Central Asia, Caucasia, Eastern Turkestan, Crimea, coast of Volga
| Göktürks, Kipchaks, Khazars, Wusun, Kangju, Türgesh.
